; characters; phylogenetic analysis of tribal relationships).

Atrecini Hatch, 1957: 172, 231 (key to genera of Pacific Northwest; genera included:
Atrecus , Parothius
).
TYPE GENUS:
Atrecus
(see Newton and Thayer, 1992: 64).

Atrecus Jacquelin du Val, 1856: 31
(species included:
pilicornis
).
TYPE SPECIES:
Staphylinus pilicornis Paykull
, fixed by original designation by monotypy.

— Tottenham, 1949: 370, 417 ( type species:
affinis Paykull
=
pilicornis Jacquelin du Val
; notes; checklist of British species).
— Hatch, 1957: 232 (characters; key to species of Pacific Northwest).

pilicornis
; key to Czechoslovakian species).

— Shilov, 1975a: 375 [= 1975b: 97] (
Atrecus
; Komi region of Russia ).
— Angelini, 1991: 190 (list of species from high elevations of Calabria , Italy ).

— Welch, 1993: 228 (cited as Atrechus ; ovariole structure and development).
— Janák, 1993a: 47 (list of species of Czech Republic and Slovakia ).
— M. Hansen, Mahler, Palm, and Pedersen, 1996: 243 (additions to list of Danish species).
— Downie and Arnett, 1996: 396 (characters; key to species of Northeastern North America).
— Assing, 1998c: 349 (key to species of Palaearctic region).

— Newton, Thayer, Ashe, and Chandler, 2000: 390 (5 Nearctic species; notes; characters in key).
